Title: Object: L'Enfance du Christ: repos de la Sainte Famille
Description: The Holy Family served by the angels during the flight into Egypt, with, at right, the Virgin, seated with Christ Child on her knees, and St Joseph standing beside her; two angels kneel before them while two others are hovering above; scene from Berlioz's 'L'Enfance du Christ'; signed proof. 1880 Lithograph, on chine collé
Bibliographic references: Hédiard 1906 / Fantin-Latour: Catalogue de l'oeuvre lithographie du Maître (28)
Fantin-Latour 1911 / Catalogue de l'Oeuvre Complet de Fantin-Latour (1011)
